title: How a 33-year-old airline pilot making $110,000 in Florida spends his money
text:
How a 33-year-old airline pilot making $110,000 in Florida spends his money

20 Hours Ago

To view this site, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser, and either the Flash Plugin or an HTML5-Video enabled browser. Download the latest Flash player and try again.

Hemant Saria, 33, lives in Tampa, Florida, and earns $110,000 a year as a pilot. This is an installment of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series, which profiles people across the U.S. and details how they earn, spend and save their money.
